availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry Clay Anderson (Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, clerk)

body.p: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, clerk. Kentucky native. Son of Robert Anderson and Adeline Anderson. Married to Annie Herr Anderson in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on November 14, 1860. Attended school in Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned one enslaved person in Louisville in 1850. Clerk in Louisville in 1860. Household owned three enslaved persons in Louisville in 1860.
